introduction: Navigate to our refugee or volunteer page by clicking the buttons below. Scroll down for further information.
Headline-About: Using High-Tech to help those who need it!
Headline-Text: Germany Says Welcome is more than just a project, it is the aim to help refugees with skills we are good at. We've created an app and the website you're browsing with certain features; for example a map with all German authorities or a sharing platform. Scroll down to find out more about Germany Says Welcome.
AdmimAndWifi: Helps refugees to find nearby administrations and free wifi.
FAQ-Text: Our FAQ provides answers to important questions.
Marketplace-Text: A digital notice-board equips you for exchanging goods and services.
Mentoring-Text: Get in contact with one particular refugee to help him directly
LetsGoTouch-Text: Do you want to get in touch with us to help improving our software? That's great! Contact us via mail, phone or social media:
